file_insights.description: Database migration script for reliability scoring models

patterns_discovered: SQLAlchemy database migration using engine and inspector
Defensive table creation with existence check
Multiple index creation for performance optimization
gotchas_discovered: Checks for existing tables before creation
Uses text() for SQL statements to prevent SQL injection
Implements unique indexes to prevent duplicate entries
recommendations: Consider adding more verbose error handling
Add additional constraints or validation on input data
Implement a version tracking mechanism for migrations
Add comments explaining the purpose of each index
